p: The yolk total cholesterol decreased significantly (p<0.05) with the ginger rhizome essential oil at all selected doses compared to the control. However, between the treated groups, the yolk contents in total cholesterol at 100 and 150 µl/kg bw were comparable and significantly (p<0.05) lower with reference to that of birds treated at 50 µl/kg bw. The total cholesterol per gram of yolk decreased significantly (p<0.05) in groups of Japanese quails exposed at 100 and 150 µl/kg bw of essential oil compared to quails in control group and quails treated with 50 µl/kg bw.
